item.title: Swift KeyPaths
item.description:
So what is a KeyPath in Swift? Lets try to answer this in a simply way, note this will not be in depth, but rather a very basic rundown of what a KeyPath is.

ðŸ“˜ Info Please Note: I Am not an expert and this is more or less a way for me to help cement the basics of this concept in my own mind. If this is of any Value to you, thats just an added bonus! {: .blockquote-info }
